publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1198 Scott Barrie: Queen Anne High School and Fife Miners' Banner-That the Parliament congratulates the students and staff on the Art and Design department of Queen Anne High School, Dunfermline, for their winning design for a new banner to commemorate the Fife Miners' Gala in recognition of Anne Picking MP's former role as the National President of UNISON in 1999-2000. R
S2M-1198 Queen Anne High School and Fife Miners' Banner (lodged on 26 April 2004) Christine May*, Jackie Baillie*, Mike Watson*, Bruce Crawford*, Robin Harper*, Margaret Jamieson*
S2M-1198 Queen Anne High School and Fife Miners' Banner (lodged on 26 April 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-1198 Queen Anne High School and Fife Miners' Banner (lodged on 26 April 2004) Cathy Peattie*

S2M-1198 Scott Barrie: Queen Anne High School and Fife Miners' Banner-That the Parliament congratulates the students and staff on the Art and Design department of Queen Anne High School, Dunfermline, for their winning design for a new banner to commemorate the Fife Miners' Gala in recognition of Anne Picking MP's former role as the National President of UNISON in 1999-2000. R Supported by: Christine May, Jackie Baillie, Mike Watson, Bruce Crawford, Robin Harper, Margaret Jamieson, Dr Jean Turner, Cathy Peattie
S2M-1198 Queen Anne High School and Fife Miners' Banner (lodged on 26 April 2004) Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-1198 Queen Anne High School and Fife Miners' Banner (lodged on 26 April 2004) Helen Eadie*
